title: Developer, WordPress Document Revisions
next:

content: • With stipend from Google, developed government- and enterprise-friendly, open-source document and workflow management system for WordPress, the content management system that powers nearly a quarter of new websites today. The project has been downloaded more than 10,000 times to date.
